name: GP-1: Part II
overview: Get Ready For Some High-Speed Action And Excitement At Home With The World Class Grand Prix Motorcycle Race. Every motorcycle racer's dream is to beat the world's best riders on the most challenging world-class circuits. In GP-1 Part II, you race on 17 courses in 14 countries across the world. As you earn points, you can now upgrade to better bikes with better racing teams. Admiring fans will want your autograph and rivals will want to test your mettle. Challenge your riding skills and show you are a world class Grand Prix racer!!
